bill.summary:
Canyon Village Land Conveyance Act
This bill amends the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act to require the Department of the Interior to convey to Kian Tr'ee Corporation, an Alaska Native village corporation, for the Native village of Canyon Village, the surface estate of up to 6,400 acres of public land selected by the corporation.
Interior must convey an equal acreage of subsurface estate to Doyon Limited, an Alaska Native regional corporation.
